SeeMore.Title: See behind the scenes
SeeMore.Text:
View the controller on and envelope code on GitHub.

This sample features:

  • Remote signing
  • Scheduled sending
  • Anchor positioning
  • Payments

Code flow:

Step 1
When the button is selected, we ask the user to provide their account information and information about the phone they would like to purchase.

Step 2

Next we create the first envelope definition. A document is created from a PDF and added to the envelope. Then we create the recipients and place tabs in the document using anchor strings.

Step 4

Then we create the second envelope that will be scheduled to be sent to the recipient later. Both documents include payment tabs and when they are signed the payment will be collected through DocuSign.
